items.sentence: Maybe something happened to change Tom\'s plans.
Tom said he was ready to face a tough challenge.
Tom said he wished he could speak French better.
French is the only foreign language I can speak.
French is the only language I know how to speak.
Get in touch with me as soon as you arrive here.
Go and talk to her, Tom. What are you afraid of?
Tom keeps an eagle feather as a good-luck charm.
Tom kept his true feelings hidden from everyone.
The lad leaned over and shouted into Tom\'s ear.
